page.title: 17"Energy in Metheringham"
page.content: The main types of{energy }in Metheringham are {solid fuel,oil,gas and{electricity}.The main ways of saving{energy}are{loft insulation, {cavity wall insulation}and{double {glazing}.Most lofts are insulated by loose{polystyrene}or{fibre glass} .If you have no loft insulation you can obtain a{grant}from the local authority.There are many types of {cavity wall insulation}like polystyrene beads or{foam.Cavity {wall insulation}can only be used in modern houses with an inner and an outer wall.A few houses have solar panels on their roof.These are used to heat water when there is sufficient sun. On most days some energy is obtained in this way. When there is insufficient energy on cloudy days then other foms of power has to be used .
